Within technology circles, the move to replace Eric Schmidt left some wondering if Page can make a successful comeback to the company he helped create during the first dot-com boom. Founder becoming CEO... Is this like a Steve Jobs returning or a Jerry Yang returning? tweeted Chris Dixon, a technology veteran who has invested in Skype and Foursquare.
